parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.48

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current [[Namespace|global namespace]] the script runs in. Could be one of the following:
* [[missionNamespace]]
* [[uiNamespace]]
* [[parsingNamespace]]
* [[profileNamespace]]
* [[localNamespace]] (since Arma 3 v1.99.146509)

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.99.146509, [[Namespace]]s can be compared with [[==]] and [[!=]] operators in addition to [[isEqualTo]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''currentNamespace'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Namespace]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[currentNamespace]] [[isEqualTo]] [[uiNamespace]]) [[then]] {[[hint]] "This is uiNamespace"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Quick function to get namespace name<code>_fn_currentNamespace = {
	if ([[currentNamespace]] [[isEqualTo]] [[missionNamespace]]) [[exitWith]] {"missionNamespace"};
	if ([[currentNamespace]] [[isEqualTo]] [[parsingNamespace]]) [[exitWith]] {"parsingNamespace"};
	if ([[currentNamespace]] [[isEqualTo]] [[profileNamespace]]) [[exitWith]] {"profileNamespace"};
	if ([[currentNamespace]] [[isEqualTo]] [[uiNamespace]]) [[exitWith]] {"uiNamespace"};
};

[[with]] [[profileNamespace]] do {
	[[systemChat]] [[call]] _fn_currentNamespace;	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>profileNamespace</value></part></template>
};
[[systemChat]] [[call]] _fn_currentNamespace;		<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>missionNamespace</value></part></template>
[[with]] [[uiNamespace]] do {
	[[systemChat]] [[call]] _fn_currentNamespace;	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>uiNamespace</value></part></template>
};</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[missionNamespace]], [[uiNamespace]], [[parsingNamespace]], [[profileNamespace]], [[localNamespace]], [[allVariables]], [[with]], [[ArmA:_Editing#Forward_Compatibility|Forward Compatibility]]
</value></part></template></root>
